original_text: I did not know how I could judge all these problems. So I told Paul, “I want to take you to Jerusalem. Would you be happy to go there? Then I will listen to what these men are saying against you. I will judge there who is right.”
korean_text: 내가 이 일에 대하여 어떻게 심리할는지 몰라서 바울에게 묻되 예루살렘에 올라가서 이 일에 심문을 받으려느냐 한즉

sentences.original_text: I did not know how I could judge all these problems
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 이 모든 문제들을 어떻게 판단해야 할지 알지 못했습니다

sentences.original_text: I want to take you to Jerusalem
Would you be happy to go there
Then I will listen to what these men are saying against you
sentences.korean_translation: 그러면 나는 이 사람들이 당신에 대해 말하는 것을 들을 것입니다

sentences.original_text: I will judge there who is right
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그곳에서 누가 옳은지 판단할 것입니다
